thread.title: Fabulous, art hotel near nyc
thread.title_full: Fabulous, art hotel near nyc - Review of The Paper Factory Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: E8463SSsusan
title: Fabulous, art hotel near nyc
text:
I stayed at The Paper Factory Hotel when on a trip to NYC. It was so close to the subway and you can get to Manhattan in no time. The management was particularly wonderful as they gave me a very good room rate as I was working on a non- profit project that benefitted the Breast Cancer Resource Center in my city. I appreciated this very much and would strongly recommend this very original hotel.
Room Tip: some rooms are quieter than others. There is construction going on right next door so ask for a quie... See more room tips
